lines.text: Oh, what is it all about?
I'd say a slight case of, uh...food poisoning.
I think either you're a lousy doctor or a lousy liar.
Good God woman! Do you think I would personally send a thousand people to their deaths?
No. But I think you'd simply let them be killed. And that's almost worse.

[On speaker phone]
I don't have to tell you what we're up against!
What you're up against? I may be the only doctor for a thousand potential plague victims if I haven't caught it myself.
That's exactly why it's important to contain the disease now and why you'll all be heading for an isolation facility in Poland, where you'll get the very best...
In the meantime, what do you intend I fight it with? Aspirin?
You can wash for a week. It will not make the slightest bit of difference.
Stop breathing! That is how the disease is transmitted.

[Very ill]
I don't look too good, hunh?
Ah, liebschoen, even now you make me wish I was fifty again!
